Package comp127graphics

Class GraphicsText

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp127graphics.GraphicsObject
      • comp127graphics.GraphicsText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Fillable
    public class GraphicsText
extends GraphicsObject
implements Fillable
    A string of text that can be drawn to the screen

      • testHit

        public boolean testHit​(double x,
                       double y)
        Description copied from class: GraphicsObject
        Tests whether the given point is on the boundary or interior of this graphic object's shape. The point is in this object's local coordinates, not canvas coordinates.

        Does not account for appearance, including stroke width and transparency.

        Specified by:
        testHit in class GraphicsObject
